content.question: Complete method upgrade. /** * Moves the passenger with the highest loyalty rating seated in * a row greater than upgradeRow to chart[upgradeRow][upgradeCol]. * Preconditions: upgradeRow and upgradeCol are valid row and * column indices, respectively, in chart. * chart[upgradeRow][upgradeCol] is null. * There is at least one passenger in a row * greater than upgradeRow. */ public void upgrade(int upgradeRow, int upgradeCol)

skill.text: 2.A: Write program code to implement an algorithm.
